title.rendered: REPRESENTATIVE OF NEWTECONS PARTICIPATED IN MARKING GRADUATION THESES OF THE FACULTY OF CIVIL ENGINEERING – HO CHI MINH CITY UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY

content.rendered:
(HCM – January 14th, 2020) While the Lunar New Year’s story at Newtecons has not been “cooled”, in the past week, Mr. Nguyen Thanh Nam – Head of Technical Department of the Company directly participated in the thesis committee of the full time training system of the Faculty of Civil Engineering – Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology.

Immediately after finishing the defence ceremony of the theses, Mr. Nam shared information that he found potential factors to join the company’s human resources. In the near future, these potential faces will be announced immediately after accepting the offer of employment at Newtecons.

In 2020, a lot of new job opportunities from Newtecons will come to good and excellent students from prestigious universities across the country. Recruitment from the moment the candidates are sitting on the school chair is a new form applied at Newtecons. Through this activity, employers and candidates will have the opportunity to interact, learn and evaluate practical competencies.

Some images of the program:
